sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ingin melanjutkan kuliah ke universitas untuk mengambil program studi BH.
english translation: "I want to continue my studies at the university to take the Bachelor of Humanities program."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ibu saya adalah seorang ibu rumah tangga biasa.
english translation: "My mother is an ordinary housewife."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saudara saya saat ini berprofesi sebagai bidan di sebuah klinik.
english translation: "My sister currently works as a midwife at a clinic."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong, bikinkan saya secangkir kopi.
english translation: "Please, make me a cup of coffee."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya tidak tahu kenapa dia tidak pernah bilang terima kasih.
english translation: "I don't know why he never says thank you."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Di kebun binatang ini, Anda dapat melihat berbagai macam binatang.
english translation: "In this zoo, you can see various kinds of animals."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya merasa bingung dengan instruksinya.
english translation: "I feel confused about the instructions."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya harus ke biro untuk mengurus administrasi.
english translation: "I have to go to the office to take care of the paperwork."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ingin mengunjungi biro pariwisata untuk mendapatkan informasi tentang tempat wisata.
english translation: "I want to visit the tourism office to get information about tourist destinations."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia seorang yang bodoh karena tidak pernah belajar.
english translation: "He is stupid because he never studies."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anjing-anjing tidak boleh masuk ke dalam area ini.
english translation: "Dogs are not allowed to enter this area."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Putri saya memiliki koleksi boneka yang sangat besar.
english translation: "My daughter has a very large collection of dolls."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Membuang air sembarangan adalah tindakan yang boros.
english translation: "Littering is a wasteful action."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ayah saya memutuskan untuk mencukur rambutnya dan sekarang dia botak.
english translation: "My father decided to shave his hair off, and now he is bald."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong beri saya air minum dalam botol.
english translation: "Please give me drinking water in a bottle."

sentence in indonesian using the words: "Bu Smith datang untuk menghadiri rapat itu."
english translation: "Mrs. Smith came to attend the meeting."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Di pasar, anda bisa menjumpai berbagai jenis buah-buahan segar.
english translation: "In the market, you can find various types of fresh fruits."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pakaian yang dikenakan oleh wanita harus menjaga agar buah dadanya tidak terlihat.
english translation: "The clothes worn by women should keep their breasts from being exposed."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bunga di vas itu bukan asli, tetapi buatan dari plastik.
english translation: "The flowers in that vase are not real, but artificial made of plastic."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Indonesia memiliki keanekaragaman budaya yang luar biasa.
english translation: "Indonesia has an incredible diversity of culture."
